products.title: Splash Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash cream roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 7.96 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2089 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash oyster electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The splash oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind giving extra peace of mind that you are investing in a product that will stand the test of time. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx1893 fabric colour: oyster material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash dove grey electric roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. 
 
 This splash dove grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The soft grey tone of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx2128 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash cream electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This cream electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. An adaptation on the classic roller blind, these electric roller blinds are child-safe by design and add a modern touch to your window. 
 
Why not splash out even more, and upgrade to the smart home hub, their wireless option that can be used with amazon alexa and the google home hub. This makes electric roller blinds perfect for hard to reach windows, and they can be opened or shut from the comfort of your own phone, perfect for keeping unwanted visitors away when on holiday. Their electric roller blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all their products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the yorkshire textile homeland, swift direct blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx2089 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
